CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Multiple Sounds
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allows multiple sounds to play at the same time

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep screen on
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Stops the screen from turning off when using the app

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display sound duration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Displays the duration of the audio file next to the file name.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show volume control by default
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows the volume control sliders button by default.

Preference.android:title: Storage directory
Preference.android:summary: Select an alternate location for the sound files (by default on internal storage in directory /sdcard/ImproSoundSystem)

ListPreference.android:title: Button size
ListPreference.android:summary: Changes the size of the sound buttons. Refresh manually after changing value.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max number of tabs
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Maximum number of tabs that are displayed.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max number of sounds per tab
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Maximum number of sounds that are displayed in each tab. High numbers can cause slowdowns or crashes on some devices.
